name: CAD
body: # A system developed to allow "Law Enforcement" personnel to respond to 911 calls such as: Family Disputes, Crime Scenes, and more but the system also includes a "CAD 911 Mapping File" which includes the 911 calls on the live map. The CAD system also allows others to edit reports that are documented as a 911 call.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
